decks.notes: The primary strategy of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's plays through countermagic and removal spells while generating card advantage. Using powerful cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Wasteland, the deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion provides additional value by allowing you to continually reuse low-cost permanents. By carefully managing resources and utilizing cards like Dig Through Time and Ancestral Recall, this Esper Control deck aims to grind out victories through careful planning and strategic play.

The key focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the necessary cards for a game-winning combo using Doomsday. The deck includes a variety of card draw and manipulation spells, such as Ponder, Preordain, and Brainstorm, to dig for key pieces like Thassa's Oracle and Doomsday. The deck also includes disruption cards like Force of Will and Duress to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With the ability to quickly and efficiently set up the combo, this deck aims to win the game in a single explosive turn.
